Package ulb.infof307.g02.gui.controller.recipe

Class RecipeConfigureController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g02.gui.controller.Controller
ulb.infof307.g02.gui.controller.recipe.RecipeConfigureController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerNavigator, IngredientViewerController.Listener, RecipeConfigureViewerController.Listener, ViewerController.ViewerListener
public class RecipeConfigureController extends Controller implements RecipeConfigureViewerController.Listener, IngredientViewerController.Listener
Controller used when creating or modifying a recipe in the app (behaviour of controller changes a bit when modifying, which explain the "modifying" attribute)
